1._title: Do you play a lot or do you mainly use your PC for surfing and office work?

options.a: I mainly use my PC for gaming
options.b: I primarily use my PC for simple applications like browsing and office work
options.c: I use my PC for a balanced mix of gaming and simple applications
options.d: I mainly use my PC for creative work like video or image editing
options.e: I use my PC for other purposes

2._title: Is a quiet and cool PC more important to you than maximum performance?

options.a: Yes, a quiet and cool PC is more important to me
options.b: No, maximum performance is more important to me
options.c: I prefer a balanced balance between performance and noise
options.e: I'm not sure, but it has to look stylish

3._title: Would you reduce performance if it significantly saves electricity?

options.a: Yes, I would reduce performance to save electricity
options.b: No, I would not reduce performance even if electricity is saved
options.c: I'm not sure if I would reduce performance
options.d: I would only reduce performance under certain conditions
options.e: I have no opinion on this
